text: Adolph Frederick Rupp (September 2, 1901 â€“ December 10, 1977) was an American college basketball coach. He coached the University of Kentucky's basketball team for 42 years from 1930 to 1972. He helped the team win 4 national NCAA championships. Rupp Arena in Lexington, Kentucky is named after him. title: Adolph Rupp
